mean_cn: n. 真菌，霉菌，菌类；  adj. 真菌的，似真菌的
mean_en: any one of a group of related plants (such as molds, mushrooms, or yeasts) that have no flowers and that live on dead or decaying things
short_phrase: Mushrooms are a kind of fungus.
sentence: Is this fungus delicious - or poisonous?
sentence_trans: 这是美味的菌类 —还是有毒的？
